-- | Please see the README on Github at
--   <a>https://github.com/mino2357/Heat-eq#readme</a>
@package Heat-eq
@version 0.1.0.0

module Lib

-- | Unboxed Array Type
type Vector1dU = Array U DIM1 Double

-- | Delay Array Type
type Vector1dD = Array D DIM1 Double

-- | 分割数
nDiv :: (Integral a) => a

-- | 左端
xMin :: (Floating a) => a

-- | 右端
xMax :: (Floating a) => a

-- | 時間刻み
dt :: (Floating a) => a

-- | 拡散係数
d :: (Floating a) => a

-- | よく使う定数
dr :: (Floating a) => a

-- | 区間[st, ed]に対して函数fを適用した函数を初期条件とする．分割数はnDiv．
makeInitCondition :: (Double -> Double) -> Double -> Double -> Int -> Vector1dU

-- | 時間をdt進める函数
timeDev :: Vector1dU -> Vector1dU

-- | 時間をdt進める函数
timeDevS :: Vector1dU -> Vector1dU

-- | 初期函数
u :: Vector1dU
coeffA :: (Floating a) => a
initX :: (Floating a) => a
stepDev :: (Floating a) => a -> a
stepDev' :: (Floating a) => a -> a
stepDev'' :: (Floating a) => a -> a
